manifest.title: NodeBB
manifest.author: NodeBB Team
manifest.description:
### Overview

A community forum allows you to engage and retain customers, keeping them interested
and up-to-date with your latest product or service.

NodeBB integrates into your existing website and social media networks, allowing you
to maximize your outreach and establish close relationships with your users.

### Features

* Mobile Responsive
* Internationalization
* SEO
* Social Integration
* Real-time streaming
* Analytics

change-default-password.message: Change the admin password and email

manifest.changelog:
* Update NodeBB to 4.8.1
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/releases/tag/v4.8.1)
* upgrade script to handle topics that were already pruned ([`03b7374`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/03b7374c))
* closes [#​13899](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/issues/13899) ([`f98de3e`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/f98de3e9))
* [#​10682](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/issues/10682), fix all the other rss routes as well ([`385a4d0`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/385a4d03))
* protocol ([`da5605e`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/da5605e0))
* closes [#​12986](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/issues/12986) ([`310e90c`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/310e90c7))
* [#​13919](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/issues/13919) ([`b2c6fbe`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/b2c6fbed))
* use min ([`090b9f5`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/090b9f55))
* [#​13918](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/issues/13918), make arrayLimit configurable increase default to 50 ([`d25e772`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/d25e7726))
* closes [#​13258](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/issues/13258), dont mark digest as delivered if it fails ([`f29c9f0`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/f29c9f06))
* wrap fields in quotes in user csv export ([`1b08aef`](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB/commit/1b08aef2))
